section.title: Download
section.p: Releases may be downloaded from Apache mirrors.

section.title: 14 Feb, 2013: release 0.5.0 available
section.p: This release introduces webhcat (a web services API to HCatalog), artifacts published in the maven central repository, and many improvements and bug fixes. Release Notes are available at the download site.

section.title: 16 May, 2012: release 0.4.0 available
section.p: This release adds support for reading and writing from Hive, switches HCatalog to use Hive's SerDe interface instead of HCatalog specific StorageDescriptors, and adds experimental support for HBase. Release Notes are available at the download site

section.title: O2 Oct, 2011: release 0.2.0 available
section.p: This is a first release of Apache HCatalog. Release Notes are available at the download site
